hero.title: Your business expansion happens here
hero.subtitle: Discover our success cases
hero.description: SLR Engineering is the right choice to materialize your projects with speed and excellence, operating in Design & Build and Turn Key models, delivering complete solutions from start to finish.

about.title: We build
about.subtitle: From concept to delivery, we are driven by transforming spaces.
about.description: At SLR Engineering, our purpose is to ensure that each client has a complete, safe and peaceful experience throughout the construction journey, from concept to ready space. Specialists in retail, corporate floors and franchises, we act with protagonism in Design & Build and Turn Key models, managing all stages with precision: approvals, project development, execution, supplies and third-party management.
about.description2: We combine technical excellence, agility and responsibility to transform ideas into environments ready to operate, with one contract, one partner and the commitment to deliver more than agreed.

card1.title: Foundation
card1.subtitle: SLR Engineering is born.
card1.description: We started our journey focused on quality, agility and commitment, working on residential, commercial and corporate projects.

card2.title: Structuring and Consolidation.
card2.subtitle: More than 120 projects delivered in Brazil.
card2.description: With qualified technical team and optimized processes, we consolidated our operation in various segments.

card3.title: Total Focus on B2B.
card3.subtitle: Specialists in retail and corporate.
card3.description: SLR starts operating exclusively in the B2B market, delivering high-end stores and offices throughout the country.

card4.title: International Expansion.
card4.subtitle: We arrived in Latin America and Europe.
card4.description: SLR goes beyond borders! We take our agile and efficient model to Argentina, Chile, Uruguay and Portugal, serving international retail.

card5.title: Presence in the USA.
card5.subtitle: Consolidated international operation.
card5.description: We expanded to the United States, executing projects for Brazilian and global brands.

card6.title: Global Presence.
card6.subtitle: SLR in the Americas and Europe.
card6.description: With capacity for 365 projects per year, we continue growing with focus on B2B, retail and corporate projects, throughout South, Central, North America and Europe.

values.title: Our Values

intelligence-quotient.title: Goal without method is just madness
intelligence-quotient.description: Here, every ambition is accompanied by process, intelligence and impeccable execution.

passion.title: Passion for challenges
passion.description: We don't move for the easy. We are moved by the new, the big and the difficult. We transform ideas into reality with creativity, curiosity and determination. We always seek the best result – with grit, technical excellence and courage to get out of the obvious.

warning.title: Sense of urgency and consistency
warning.description: Agility with intelligence. Speed with criteria. We anticipate needs, foresee problems and act with empathy, discipline and method. For us, every decision counts – in time, cost and impact.

teamwork.title: Collaboration that delivers
teamwork.description: No solid result is built alone. We act as one team, with dialogue, transparency and focus on the client. Together, we deliver more than agreed – on time, with quality and responsibility.

superhero.title: Excellence with protagonist attitude
superhero.description: We act with genuine commitment. We plan with precision, execute with competence and correct with agility. We take responsibility for each delivery, because we know it represents our brand, the client's trust – and the future of our company.

values.description2: We work on construction and renovation projects for offices, retail stores and franchise networks throughout the national territory.

cases.title: Cases
cases.subtitle: Projects that build results
cases.description: Our projects go beyond physical delivery, they transform spaces into strategic assets. With more than 1,000 projects delivered in Brazil and Latin America, we expanded our operations to the United States, always focusing on efficiency, aggressive deadlines and technical excellence. Specialists in corporate and retail projects, we serve companies that seek agility, standardization and quality to grow with security, scale and predictability.
cases.title2: Your corporate space, your next achievement
cases.cta2: Discover how we transformed this office

form-contato.description2: Need to build, renovate or expand your operation? Whether it's a new construction, renovation or expansion, the SLR Engineering team is ready to understand your needs and deliver the best solution.

footer.description: SLR Engineering is the right choice to materialize your projects with speed and excellence, operating in Design & Build and Turn Key models, delivering complete solutions from start to finish.

about-us.title: Building ideas.
about-us.description: One of Brazil's leading engineering companies, specialized in complete solutions from design to construction, always focused on quality, efficiency and innovation.
about-us.description2: With more than 1,000 projects completed throughout Latin America, transforming ideas into reality is the essence of our work. Our process begins with personalized consulting, follows with integrated design and construction execution and culminates in the final delivery — ready to generate value.
about-us.description3: At SLR Engineering, every detail of your project is conducted with efficiency, transparency and excellence. Let's build together?

benefit1.title: Integrated Solutions
benefit1.description: complete services in a single contract.

benefit2.title: Client Focus
benefit2.description: each project is unique, developed side by side with you.

benefit3.title: Quality and Excellence
benefit3.description: commitment from material selection to final delivery.

about-us.visao-description: To be recognized as a leading engineering company in Latin America, delivering innovative and sustainable solutions that exceed our clients' expectations.
about-us.missao-description: To provide high-quality engineering services, from design to construction, ensuring total satisfaction of our clients through an integral, efficient and sustainable approach.
about-us.valores-description: Passion for challenges, which drives us to seek innovative solutions; collaborative work, promoting union and synergy in our team; sense of urgency and importance, ensuring we deliver results at the right time; and excellence, committed to quality in everything we do.
about-us.description4: Our team transforms planning into results. Specialists, managers and field professionals work together with absolute focus on delivering results. We combine experience, diversity of skills and passion for what we do, ensuring that each project is conducted with precision, safety and excellence. Our teams are dedicated exclusively to each project, ensuring total attention and personalized solutions. We transform complex processes into clear, safe and fluid experiences for our clients. Our operation transcends borders: in addition to all Brazilian territory, we are present in Latin America and North America, coordinating projects and works with agility, integration and responsibility.

turn-key.title: Turn Key
turn-key.subtitle: for Retail & Office
turn-key.description: The Turn Key model is ideal for projects that require total management of the construction process, from conception to final delivery. Our team assumes all responsibility, from project approval to delivery of the space ready for operation.
turn-key.description2: The Turn Key model takes integration to a level where every detail of the work is centralized in a single partner. The entire chain, executive project, supplies, third-party management, execution and final finishes, is conducted under a single coordination, which eliminates dispersed decision points and reduces failure risks. The client receives a completed environment, technically validated and ready to start operation on the defined deadline. This approach offers maximum simplicity, with predictable deadlines, controlled costs and the security that the space will be delivered exactly as planned, already ready to function from the first day.
turn-key.description3: A single partner coordinates all stages: project, supplies, execution and third-party management. Elimination of multiple decision points and risk reduction.
turn-key.description4: Finished space, technically validated and ready for immediate operation. Deadlines and costs defined with predictability.
turn-key.description5: Single control ensures quality and compliance at each stage. The client receives the completed work without additional management effort.
turn-key.example: This model is especially strategic for expanding companies, retail networks and franchises, as it allows replicating units with consistency and predictability, reducing the time between the decision to open a new operation and the effective start of activities.

design-build.title: Design-Build
design-build.description: The Design & Build model integrates project and execution in a single contract. This means that planning, architecture, engineering, supplies and construction are conducted in a coordinated way, reducing risks, deadlines and costs. This model ensures that the environment is ready to operate from the first day, aligned with the brand and consumer experience, in addition to allowing scalable and standardized business expansion.
design-build.subtitle: Direct benefits for the client:

benefit1.title: Feasibility
benefit1.description: Detailed briefings to ensure correct technical and financial decisions.

benefit2.title: Project
benefit2.description: Personalized solutions that translate the brand identity.

benefit3.title: Construction
benefit3.description: Complete management of construction sites and suppliers, ensuring predictability.

benefit4.title: Retrofit
benefit4.description: Modernization of spaces in operation with minimal impact.

item1.description:
In the heart of Cidade Monções, São Paulo's corporate hub, V4 Company found the ideal space for its flagship office.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the entire project journey on the 6th floor of the Ronaldo Sampaio Ferreira Building: complementary projects, complete execution and turnkey delivery. In 700m², we transformed concept into result, coordinating each stage so that V4 could operate in a ready, functional environment aligned with its innovative identity in marketing.

item2.description:
In Campinas, V4 Company consolidated its headquarters in a single-user space of 6,500m², designed to reflect the strength and innovation of the company in the marketing sector.

SLR Engineering conducted the entire project journey: complementary projects, complete execution and turnkey delivery. In just 120 days, we transformed concept into reality, delivering a spacious, modern and fully ready-to-operate corporate environment.

item3.description:
On Av. das Nações Unidas, in Brooklin, Levi's established its new corporate office in 750m² at the TNU Building, a consolidated address in São Paulo's corporate scene.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project and complementary projects, conducting the entire process in turnkey model. In 90 days, we transformed concept into space ready to operate, aligned with the brand identity and prepared to boost its operations in Brazil.

item4.description:
In Vila Olímpia, São Paulo, iPlace inaugurated its new space at Milan Head Office, occupying 400m² in one of the most dynamic addresses in the city's corporate sector.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project and complementary projects, in turnkey model. In just 30 days, we conducted the entire journey to deliver a ready, functional environment aligned with the brand's technological DNA.

item5.description:
In Paraíso, one of São Paulo's most traditional corporate addresses, Humanitare chose the 12th floor of the Paulista Plaza Building Condominium for its new office.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the entire journey: complementary projects, complete execution and turnkey delivery. In 230 m², we transformed concept into space ready to operate, aligned with the brand's needs and the building's standard of excellence.

item6.description: Corporate renovation for HM, creating a modern and functional environment for the civil construction segment.

item7.description:
In Barueri, in the region that concentrates some of the largest business centers in Greater São Paulo, a technology company chose the Rio Negro Administrative Center for its new corporate hub.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project in turnkey model, conducting each stage of the process, from planning to final delivery. In 1,600 m², we created a spacious, modern environment fully ready to drive innovation, completed in just 60 days.

item8.description:
In Pinheiros, one of São Paulo's most creative and vibrant neighborhoods, Habras chose the Win Work Condominium to install its new corporate office.

SLR Engineering took on the complete project in turnkey model, coordinating each stage to ensure an agile and high-quality result. In just 30 days, we transformed 650 m² into a functional and contemporary space, ready to receive the construction company's operation.

item9.description:
In Miami, in the vibrant Wynwood district, Uultis inaugurated its new flagship on North Miami Avenue, an address that breathes art, design and lifestyle.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the entire project execution in turnkey model, coordinating every detail to deliver a sophisticated and functional retail space. In just 30 days, we transformed 600 m² into a store that reflects the furniture brand's identity and its contemporary design proposal.

item10.description:
In Porto Alegre, Reserva chose the BSCG Carlos Gomes Shopping, on Av. Carlos Gomes, to strengthen its presence in the premium retail of the capital of Rio Grande do Sul.

SLR Engineering conducted the complete project in turnkey model, taking care of every detail so that the new store reflected the striking style of the clothing brand. In just 45 days, we transformed 195 m² into a space that translates Reserva's identity and provides a unique shopping experience.

item11.description:
In the effervescent Vila Madalena, in São Paulo, Sirene opened the doors of its new store on Rua Harmonia, an address known for its gastronomic and cultural scene.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete execution of the project in turnkey model. In just 30 days, we transformed 145.63 m² into a welcoming and functional space, ready to receive customers and transmit the brand's essence in the food universe.

item12.description:
At BarraShopping, one of Rio de Janeiro's main shopping centers, Plié strengthened its presence in fashion retail with a new 40 m² store.

SLR Engineering executed the complete project in turnkey model, taking care of every detail to deliver an elegant and functional space in just 30 days. The result is a store ready to receive customers with the style and sophistication characteristic of the brand.

item13.description:
At Outlet Premium Rio de Janeiro, in Duque de Caxias, Oficina inaugurated a new store to strengthen its presence in fashion retail.

SLR Engineering executed the complete project in turnkey model, delivering 175 m² fully finished in just 30 days, with the quality and agility standard that the project required.

item14.description:
At Outlet SoMarcas Guarulhos, the Live! brand strengthened its presence in fashion retail with a new store.

SLR Engineering executed the complete project in turnkey model, delivering 143 m² finished in just 30 days, on time and with the quality the project required.

item15.description:
In Vila Guilherme, São Paulo, Livo inaugurated its new store at Shopping Center Norte, occupying 40m² in one of the city's main retail centers.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project, in turnkey model. In just 30 days, we conducted the entire execution to deliver a functional, modern space aligned with the accessories brand's positioning.

item16.description:
In São Roque, Levi's inaugurated its new store at Catarina Fashion Outlet, occupying 280m² in one of the main fashion retail shopping destinations in Brazil.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project, in turnkey model. In just 30 days, we conducted the entire execution to deliver a space ready to operate, modern and aligned with the global identity of the clothing brand.

item17.description:
In Curitiba, iPlace inaugurated its new store at Shopping Pátio Batel, occupying 153m² in one of the most sophisticated addresses in technology retail in Paraná.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project, in turnkey model. In just 30 days, we conducted the entire execution to deliver a space ready to operate, modern and aligned with the brand's technological DNA.

item18.description:
Located at R. Dr. César, 874 – Santana, São Paulo, the new Gua.co unit was designed to offer a unique experience in the food segment, combining modern design and functionality.

SLR Engineering carried out the complete project in turnkey model, delivering a 260m² space fully finished and ready for operation in just 30 days.

item19.description:
At Shopping Dom Pedro Campinas, Gua.co inaugurated another unit strengthening its presence in the food sector, in one of the region's main shopping centers.

SLR Engineering executed the complete project in turnkey model, delivering a 93m² space ready for operation in 60 days.

item20.description:
In the traditional Perdizes region, in São Paulo, Gua.co opened the doors of its new unit, consolidating its operations in the food segment with another gastronomic experience space.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project in turnkey model, conducting all stages to deliver a 298m² environment ready in 60 days.

item21.description:
In the heart of Liberdade, in São Paulo, Bandai inaugurated its store at Galeria Imperial, bringing a space totally focused on entertainment and Japanese pop culture.

SLR Engineering was responsible for the complete project in turnkey model, conducted in just 30 days, to deliver a 120m² environment ready to receive the brand's fans.

item22.description:
Boger Burguer, in Itaim Bibi, gained a new space that combines contemporary design and efficiency.
SLR Engineering took care of every detail of the project and complementary projects in turnkey model, delivering 200 m² fully ready in just 60 days, transforming the project into a real experience for customers and employees.

item23.description:
Bom Beef Burguer, at Shopping Mooca, gained a new modern store, designed for fast and efficient operation.
SLR Engineering was responsible for the entire project execution and complementary projects, operating in turnkey model to deliver a space ready in record time.
In just 60 days, 53.74 m² were transformed into a functional environment, with attention to every detail, ensuring quality, organization and practicality for the store's operation.
